title: Manikyam Peacock Haaram: A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: meticulously crafted with a lustrous Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with high-quality Rubies (Manikyam)
Emeralds (Panna) and sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. The gold exhibits exceptional color and sheen.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a stunning peacock (Mayura) motif pendant, a symbol of beauty and grace in South Indian culture. Features intricate filigree work and a delicate arrangement of CZ stones that enhance the brilliance of the rubies and emeralds. The pendant is further enhanced with a cascade of gold bead drops adding a touch of elegance. The necklace strand itself is a double-layered design embellished with CZ settings.
colors: Predominantly Gold with vibrant pops of Ruby red and Emerald green. The CZ stones offer a dazzling white sparkle
creating a harmonious and eye-catching palette.
occasions: or any significant cultural celebration. Equally stunning when paired with modern attire for a touch of timeless elegance. Ideal for muhurtham
description: A masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, this haaram is more than just jewelry; it's a heritage piece. The peacock design carries profound cultural significance, representing beauty, royalty and prosperity. The combination of high-quality gold, vibrant gemstones, and intricate detailing makes this a truly unique and valuable investment. It is designed for durability, making it a treasured heirloom for generations.
